CustomField.description: Lookup field to Primary Sales Rep When a new Quote is created from an Account or Opportunity Record, the Primary Sales Rep field is pre-populated (but editable) with the Primary Sales Rep tied to the related Account When a new Quote is created from an Opportunity, the Primary Sales Rep field on the Quote object is pre-populated with the Primary Sales Rep from the Opportunity’s related Account, regardless of the Primary Sales Rep listed on the Opportunity. When a new Quote is created from a Contact, the Primary Sales Rep field on the Quote object is pre-populated with the Primary Sales Rep from the Contact’s related Account record, regardless of the Primary Sales Rep listed on the Contact. When a Quote is cloned, the new Quote’s Primary Sales Rep field on the new cloned Quote is pre-populated with the Primary Sales Rep from the Quote it was cloned from
CustomField.label: Primary Sales Rep
